featured.text: While it does have its share of resort hotels, shopping centers and good restaurants, and a smattering of museums, art galleries and night spots, its main attractions lie outdoors.

other.text: A month after their release, the whales were spotted.

definition.zh_def: 點、斑點；注意到或發現某物
definition.en_def: A small mark or stain; to notice or identify something.
definition.example: She found a spot of ink on her shirt.
